message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $8800. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for it. I'm thinking of $9200. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8600. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me. I'm thinking of $9000, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. What do you think?
I appreciate the extras you're offering, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8800. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8900, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. What do you think?
I'm close to accepting, Alice, but I still need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8700. Can you meet me at that price?
